verses.verse: Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> about when <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> [were] <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> to the <S%H3220>west,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> [were] by the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H854>how<s%> <S%H834><s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H3001>dried<s%> up the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> they had <S%H5674>crossed,<s%> that their <S%H3824>hearts<s%> <S%H4549>melted,<s%> and there was <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> in them <S%H5750>any<s%> <S%H5750>longer,<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

At that <S%H6256>time<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H6213>"Make<s%> for yourself <S%H6864>flint<s%> <S%H2719>knives<s%> and <S%H4135>circumcise<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H8145>time.<s%>"
So <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> himself <S%H6864>flint<s%> <S%H2719>knives<s%> and <S%H4135>circumcised<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> at Gibeath-haaraloth.

And <S%H2088>this<s%> is the <S%H1697>reason<s%> <S%H834>why<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H4135>circumcised<s%> them: <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> who <S%H3318>came<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> who were <S%H2145>males,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war,<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> along the <S%H1870>way,<s%> after they <S%H3318>came<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

For <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> who <S%H3318>came<s%> out were <S%H4135>circumcised,<s%> but <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> who were <S%H3209>born<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> along the <S%H1870>way<s%> as they <S%H3318>came<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> had not been <S%H4135>circumcised.<s%>

For the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1980>walked<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nation,<s%> [that is,] the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> who <S%H3318>came<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H8552>perished<s%> <S%H834>because<s%> they did not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> to <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H7650>sworn<s%> that He would not let them <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H7650>sworn<s%> to their fathers to <S%H1>give<s%> us, a <S%H5414>land<s%> <S%H776>flowing<s%> with <S%H2100>milk<s%> and <S%H2461>honey.<s%>

And their <S%H1121>children<s%> whom He <S%H6965>raised<s%> up in their <S%H8478>place,<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H4135>circumcised;<s%> for they were <S%H6189>uncircumcised,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they had not <S%H4135>circumcised<s%> them along the <S%H1870>way.<s%>

Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> about <S%H9201>when<s%> they had <S%H8552>finished<s%> <S%H4135>circumcising<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nation,<s%> that they <S%H3427>remained<s%> in their <S%H8478>places<s%> in the <S%H4264>camp<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> they were <S%H2421>healed.<s%>

Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H3117>"Today<s%> I have <S%H1556>rolled<s%> <S%H1556>away<s%> the <S%H2781>reproach<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> from you." So the <S%H8034>name<s%> of that <S%H4725>place<s%> is <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

While the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2583>camped<s%> at <S%H1537>Gilgal,<s%> they <S%H6213>observed<s%> the <S%H6453>Passover<s%> on the <S%H6153>evening<s%> of the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2320>month<s%> on the <S%H6160>desert<s%> <S%H6160>plains<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho.<s%>

And on the <S%H4283>day<s%> <S%H4283>after<s%> the <S%H6453>Passover,<s%> on that <S%H6106>very<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> they <S%H398>ate<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of the <S%H5669>produce<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H4682>cakes<s%> and <S%H7033>parched<s%> [grain].

And the <S%H4478>manna<s%> <S%H7673>ceased<s%> on the <S%H4283>day<s%> <S%H4283>after<s%> they had <S%H398>eaten<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of the <S%H8393>produce<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> so that the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>longer<s%> <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H4478>manna,<s%> but they <S%H398>ate<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of the <S%H8393>yield<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> during that <S%H8141>year.<s%>

Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> about when <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> was by <S%H3405>Jericho,<s%> that he <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> and <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> was <S%H5975>standing<s%> <S%H5048>opposite<s%> him with his <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H8025>drawn<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to him and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, "Are you for us <S%H518>or<s%> for our <S%H6862>adversaries<s%>?"

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3808>"No,<s%> <S%H3588>rather<s%> I <S%H3588>indeed<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> [as] <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H6635>host<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>" And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> on his <S%H6440>face<s%> to the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H7812>bowed<s%> <S%H7812>down,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H4100>"What<s%> has my <S%H136>lord<s%> to <S%H1696>say<s%> to his <S%H5650>servant<s%>?"

And the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the Lord's <S%H6635>host<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H5394>"Remove<s%> your <S%H5275>sandals<s%> from your <S%H7272>feet,<s%> for the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H5921><s%> you are <S%H5975>standing<s%> is <S%H6944>holy.<s%>" And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so.<s%>
